front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for High Voltage Direct Current (HVDC) Composite Post Insulators

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard applies to outdoor and indoor composite station post insulators used in HVDC power transmission systems. The composite station post insulators covered by this standard consist of a load-bearing insulating core (or tube), a housing (outside the insulating solid core or tube) made of elastomer material (e.g., silicone or ethylene-propylene) and end fittings attached to the insulating core (or tube).
